<title level="1" right="Rules">[Removing Corruption](/Rules.aspx?ID=1564)</title>

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 234 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
The effects of soulforged corruption can be staved off with the [Cleanse Soul Path](/Actions.aspx?ID=774) exploration activity or cured with the [_purify soul path_](/Rituals.aspx?ID=67) ritual.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
